Verification of the source of the claim: The expert examined the Facebook user who posted the images and investigated their credibility and history of spreading misinformation.
Analysis of the photographs: The expert conducted a reverse image search and compared the images to known events and historical records to determine their authenticity and origins.
Comparison with actual events: The expert cross-referenced the dates and locations mentioned in the claim with the historical records of Hurricane Dorian and confirmed that the events depicted in the photographs did not align with the hurricane.
Expert testimony and research findings: The expert referred to the statement of Houston police Chief Art Acevedo, who provided data and research indicating that overall crime, including looting, tends to decrease during natural disasters. This information contradicted the claim made in the Facebook post.
